text: Canke mube ikiremwa icarico cose mubiremwa biboneka yuko bikomeye mumitima yanyu, aho niho bazovuga bati:- ni nde azodusubiza nkuko twamye? Nawe bishure uti:- nâ€™urya yabaremye ubwa mbere, aho niho bazozunzagiza imitwe yabo hanyuma bavuge bati:- ibi vyose bizoba ryari? Wewe vuga uti:- nkumbure vyoba biri hafi
